About Me

I started out as a pre-med student nursing student, but an intro coding class completely hooked me. Watching my first “Hello World” appear and building my first webpage with Python Flask was electrifying! I realized I loved turning ideas into reality. This led me to switch majors and dive deep into learning everything I could about programming. Outside of coding, I'm a ballerina, if you could not tell by my color scheme. The discipline I use in ballet, I firmly believe transfers over into my digital creativity.

Projects

  • SafeRouteDC: I created a web app that calculates a safety score by assigning a weight to various crimes along a route. It then displays the different route options via Google Maps API.
    Click here to see the live project.
